sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Box, Grid, VStack, HStack, Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionButton, AccordionIcon, AccordionPanel } from "@chakra-ui/react" /***************************************************************/ import { Textarea } from "../style_components/textarea" import { Text } from "../style_components/text" import { SymbolButton } from "./symbol_button" import { symbols } from "../ressources/symbols" import { FontSizeControler } from "./font_size_controler" /***************************************************************/ export function SpellDescription(props) { const [selectedSymbol, setSelectedSymbol] = useState(""); const [inputValue, setInputValue] = useState(""); function addSymbolToTextbox(symbolTEST) { let ooooo = inputValue.concat("[" + symbolTEST + "]") setInputValue(ooooo); props.setSpellDescription(ooooo); } return ( Abilities :
